review_blob:
One of my favorites from this brewery. Full bodied and good for the autumn / winter season. Poured from a bottle. Could have slightly more carbonation... Slightly.. 

I like this beer and have purchased it multiple times and will continue to do so.
Overall a decent beer. Not much for aroma. Nice chocolate and roasted malt flavor is what makes this beer. Poured from a bottle - appearance just doesn't do it for me.
Drank it on tap - super chocolate, super smooth. Milky, I dig it and I'd do it again.
I can't really say anything bad about this beer - but I also can't say anything wonderful about it either...
